alert.note: Alert for Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 2:07PM EDT until October 01 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Back bays near the coast of Ocean County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 6 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...Tidal departures and the astronomical high tide levels will be on the decrease during the new week. While some spotty minor tidal flooding remains possible on Monday, it should not be impactful enough to warrant another Coastal Flood Advisory.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
